definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to be made to stand still as a punishment

sentences.english: They are motivated by the twin color=# cc0066> goads of punishment and reward.
sentences.chinese: 他们受赏与罚的双重因素所激励。

sentences.english: In preparation for your Actua Cup campaign you can practice in friendlies and penalty shootout competitions.
sentences.chinese: 为冠军杯做准备，先在友谊赛和罚点球竞赛中练习。

sentences.english: David Lau was given 30 seconds penalty due to the jump start.
sentences.chinese: 凯飞车队的刘英杰因偷跑而被罚时30秒。

sentences.english: Okur and Kirilenko both fouled out in the final minute.
sentences.chinese: 在最后时刻奥库和基里连科双双被罚出场。

sentences.english: A city Laonongganzhao donkey, donkey Chuanghong Deng, fined 10 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 一老农赶著毛驴进城，驴闯红灯，罚10元。

sentences.english: And you once fouled because of striking.
sentences.chinese: 你有一次曾因为打人犯规而被罚出场外。

sentences.english: I believe that punishing them by depriving them of sweet things only develops greediness.
sentences.chinese: 我想，罚孩子不吃甜馅饼，只能增强他们的贪欲。

sentences.english: They've built a wall of players for a penalty shot.
sentences.chinese: 他们筑起一堵人墙准备对付罚点球射门。

sentences.english: I hope he's right, 'cause if he's not, it'll cost him one of his three time-outs.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他是对的，不然三个暂停，就要被罚掉一个咯。

sentences.english: Closed Area defensive side foul, offensive side or indirect punishment completely arbitrary ball.
sentences.chinese: 禁区内防守方犯规，进攻方罚点球或间接任意球。

sentences.english: I didn't want to punish you leap-frog.
Shorrock took the penalty kick making the ball swerve into the top right-hand corner of the net.
sentences.chinese: 罚点球时，肖罗克一个弧线球将球踢进右上角。

sentences.english: Nahor, you shall be punished by tending to the sheep for Abram and Haran.
sentences.chinese: 纳曷尔，你被罚替亚伯兰和哈兰放羊。

sentences.english: Two players got into a fight and were sent to the penalty box for two minutes.
sentences.chinese: 两名打架的球员被罚到惩罚席上坐二分钟。

sentences.english: They are motivated by the twin goads of punishment and reward.
sentences.chinese: 他们受赏与罚的双重因素所激励。

sentences.english: As a result, misfortune befell. Liu Hongyu fouled out, too.
sentences.chinese: 结果厄运降临，刘宏宇也被罚掉。

definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
to deduct marks (when grading school work)/to have marks deducted/penalty points/to lose points for a penalty or error
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
lit. not to change, despite repeated admonition/incorrigible/unrepentant
